summary: The Reignite Hope Act of 2025 amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish a tax credit of $3,500 for "hired critical employees" in qualified opportunity zones, defined as healthcare professionals, law enforcement, rescue personnel, firefighters, childcare providers, and home care aides. It also makes permanent and modifies provisions of the child tax credit, increasing the per-child credit and extending a dependent credit and makes corresponding changes to the tax code.
